headline: Datadog Appoints Ami Vora to Its Board of Directors
summary: New York, New York--(Newsfile Corp. - September 11, 2025) - Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the monitoring and security platform for cloud applications, today announced the appointment of Ami Vora to its Board of Directors. "Throughout my career, I've loved creating products for people who are passionate about building things," said Vora. "I'm inspired by how Datadog makes it easy for builders at companies of all sizes to observe, secure and refine their mission-critical products. I look forward..
